      • registerNewUser

        public void registerNewUser(java.lang.String fullName,
                            int[] cpf,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String firstName,
                            java.lang.String lastName,
                            int userType)
                     throws UserIsRegistredException,
                            UserInvalidException,
                            DataCannotBeAccessedException
        Registra novo usuario
        Parameters:
        fullName - Full name
        cpf - CPF
        password - Password
        firstName - First Name
        lastName - Last name
        userType - User Type (User.LEVEL_*)
        Throws:
        UserIsRegistredException - if user is registred
        UserInvalidException - if user cpf or password is invalid
        DataCannotBeAccessedException - if data cannot be acessed

        if it was achieved
